analysis.description:
OysterPearl (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#5-424) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#325-328)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#204-251) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= epoch)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#204-251) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= epoch) (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#219-220)

OysterPearl.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#9-10)
OysterPearl.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#7-8)
OysterPearl.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x45ff79f0b2a9ec945126da3d75bbc3c84d6937fc.sol#8-9)
